brownshome.scriptwars.server.game

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • brownshome.scriptwars.server.game.Game
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TankGame, TestGame

    public abstract class Game
extends Object
    The interface that all played games must implement.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static long CLOSING_GRACE
      The time the game has to close in millis

        public static final long CLOSING_GRACE
        The time the game has to close in millis
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • hasPerPlayerData

        public abstract boolean hasPerPlayerData()
        Returns:
        If the game sends specific data to each player

      • getMaximumPlayers

        public abstract int getMaximumPlayers()
        Returns:
        The maximum amount of players that can join this game

      • getTickRate

        public abstract int getTickRate()
        Returns:
        The time between each tick in milliseconds

      • getDataSize

        public abstract int getDataSize()
        Returns:
        The maximum size of the data to send in bytes per player.

      • getData

        public abstract boolean getData(Player player,
                                ByteBuffer data)
        Requests the data packet to be sent to a particular player.
        Parameters:
        player - The player's data that is being requested. This will be null if hasPerPlayerData() is false
        data - A ByteBuffer that the new data is to be written to.

      • processData

        public abstract void processData(ByteBuffer data,
                                 Player player)
        Called when an incoming packet is recieved. The packet will always be for the correct tick it is recieved.
        Parameters:
        data - A ByteBuffer containing the data
        player - The player that the data was recieved from

      • removePlayer

        public void removePlayer(Player p)
        Called when a player times out from the server
        Parameters:
        p -

      • getName

        public static String getName()
        Returns:
        The name of this game to be displayed on the website

      • getDescription

        public static String getDescription()
        Returns:
        A short description of the game to be displayed on the website.

      • addPlayer

        public void addPlayer(Player player)

      • getGame

        public static Game getGame(int gameCode)

      • gameEnded

        public void gameEnded()
        Causes the game loop to exit. This should be called from the tick method

      • start

        public void start()

      • getID

        public int getID()
        Returns a byte used to identify this game.
